long_description: The light and rugged Lowepro Dashpoint 10 camera case offers a functional and outdoor-inspired carrying solution for a point-and-shoot camera or a wide variety of electronic devices. Versatile attachment system provides vertical webbing and horizontal flaps with rip-and-stick fasteners to easily secure to pouch to loops, straps or a daisy chain. Wide-mouth opening with reverse zippers offers easy access to gear; durable EVA padding provides impact-resistant protection. Memory card pocket inside the top lid supplies a convenient place to stash spare memory. Lowepro Dashpoint 10 camera case features a removable, adjustable shoulder strap with rotating snap hooks.
short_description: The light and rugged Lowepro Dashpoint 10 camera case offers a functional and outdoor-inspired carrying solution for a point-and-shoot camera or a wide variety of electronic devices.
